text: the united states has reopened its land
and air borders to travelers from much
of the world 20 months after a ban was
first imposed now this easing of
restrictions covers the uk brazil china
india island south africa and the 26
european countries in the schengen zone
potentially tens of millions of
travelers there are still some rules in
place though to be eligible to travel
people will need to be fully vaccinated
with an authorised jab
eight vaccines you might know them as
fisa moderna astrazeneca kovacson cover
shield cyanofarm and synovac they will
require two jabs and johnson johnson the
single jab travelers will have to
provide proof of vaccination and they
will also have to provide either a
negative covert test result or show that
they have recently recovered from the
virus now children don't need to be
vaccinated but any age between two and
17 years old will have to take a covert
test between three and five days after
arriving in the u.s let's bring you the
thoughts now of some people very happy
that they're able to fly to the u.s
again

what are your plans where are you in

spoke to the chief executive officers
from both companies
shy to start with you first you are the
ceo of virgin atlantic we haven't been
able to fly uk travelers across the
atlantic in the vast majority of cases
for 20 months what sort of impact has
that had on your business
well our story has been very well
documented but today really is a day of
celebration finally after more than 600
days
this important corridor between the uk
and the united states is opening and
just to hear these stories of uniting

connect and and start
getting back to

today
and sean
some people are worried as well that now
that travel is back open again to
america that flight prices might go up
what reassurance can you give is that
something that people are going to see
like i can say there's fantastic value

there's a lot of demand for people to

now a really crucial question of course

and aviation is

we're going to do everything we can to

as a necessary step

soon
yeah i would echo what shai is saying
